Kohli is a naturally aggressive batsman with strong technical skills. He usually bats in the middle-order, but, on many occasions, has opened the innings as well. He bats with a slightly open-chested stance and a strong bottom-hand grip,  and is said to have quick footwork. He is known for his wide range of shots, ability to pace an innings and batting under pressure.
